bcbioRNASeq
  • Reference
  • News

Sample Metadata

Returns the sample metadata.

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
sampleMetadata(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqDataSet
sampleMetadata(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqTransform
sampleMetadata(object, ...)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments (for the S4 generic definition).

Value

data.frame.

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "bcb.rda"),
    package = "bcbioRNASeq"))

# bcbioRNASeq
sampleMetadata(bcb) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 4
#> Variables: 4
#> $ sampleID    <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ sampleName  <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ description <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ group       <fct> ctrl, ctrl, ko, ko

# DESeqDataSet
dds <- bcbio(bcb, "DESeqDataSet")
sampleMetadata(dds) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 4
#> Variables: 5
#> $ sampleID    <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ sampleName  <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ description <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ group       <fct> ctrl, ctrl, ko, ko
#> $ sizeFactor  <fct> 0.909065432053506, 1.02789752352872, 1.04640556301908, ...

# DESeqTransform
rld <- assays(bcb)[["rlog"]]
sampleMetadata(rld) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 4
#> Variables: 5
#> $ sampleID    <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ sampleName  <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ description <fct> group1_1, group1_2, group2_1, group2_2
#> $ group       <fct> ctrl, ctrl, ko, ko
#> $ sizeFactor  <fct> 0.909065432053506, 1.02789752352872, 1.04640556301908, ...
